T02D1982:159b-1: shr'i badzra bhee ra wa s'a dha na karma au pa tsa ra satva sam gra ha /
T02D1982:159b-3: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed sgrub pa'i thabs dang las bya ba'i cho ga sems dpa' bsdus pa /
T02D1982:159b-4: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1982:159b-5: rgyal ba'i dbang po 'jam pa'i dbyangs //
T02D1982:159b-6: mgon po dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1982:159b-7: 'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D1982:159b-8: de yi sgrub thabs bshad par bya //
T02D1982:159b-9: ngo bo nyid med sku mnga' zhing //
T02D1982:159b-10: sgyu ma'i gzugs can 'byung gnas che //
T02D1982:159b-11: sangs rgyas rnams ni sprul pa yi //
T02D1982:159b-12: sras po thu bor rab tu grags //
T02D1982:159b-13: bcom ldan mgon po de nyid mkhyen //
T02D1982:159b-14: dpal ldan khyab bdag las kyi bdag / yid bzhin nor bu chen po ltar //
T02D1982:159b-15: ji ltar 'dod pa'i skur ston mdzad //
T02D1982:159b-16: dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1982:160a-2: ri dang nags tshal phug rnams dang //
T02D1982:160a-3: chu 'gram dag dang mdo rnams dang //
T02D1982:160a-4: rgya mtsho che dang nyams dga' dang //
T02D1982:160a-5: shing gcig dang ni dur khrod rnams //
T02D1982:160a-6: gnas kyi bye brag bstan mod kyi //
T02D1982:160a-7: ji ltar dga' ba'i gnas rnams su //
T02D1982:160a-8: 'di der sbyor ba byas pa yis //
T02D1982:160a-10: der ni bde zhing rgya che ba'i //
T02D1982:160a-11: stan la rnam par 'dug nas ni //
T02D1982:160a-12: sbyor ba 'di ni bsam par bya //
T02D1982:160a-13: snying ga'i mkha' dkyil padma yi //
T02D1982:160a-14: dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02D1982:160a-15: de dbus de nyid dam pa ni //
T02D1982:160a-16: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid dge /'od zer sna
T02D1982:160a-17: sogs 'bar ba'i bdag / thams cad kun du spro
T02D1982:160a-18: bar bya // sems tsam du ni gnas nas ni //
T02D1982:160a-19: byang chub sems kyi sdom pa bzung //
T02D1982:160a-20: de nas sngon du brjod pa'i yi ge h'um las
T02D1982:160a-21: 'od zer 'phros pas nam mkha'i khams thams cad du
T02D1982:160a-22: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi lha'i dkyil 'khor gyis gang
T02D1982:160a-23: bar bsams te / bya sna tshogs la zhon pa /
T02D1982:160a-24: gzhon nu sangs rgyas kyi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1982:160a-25: bcom ldan 'das de rnams la mchod pa'i phyir rang
T02D1982:160a-26: gi snying gar yi ge mum bsam par bya ste
T02D1982:160a-27: / de nas lha mo drug lta bu'i 'od zer
T02D1982:160a-28: 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyan
T02D1982:160a-29: / drangs nas / dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod pas mnyes pa la thug par bya ste /
T02D1982:160a-30: yang rang gi snying gnas lha mo'i 'od zer 'phros pas phyag byas te /
T02D1982:160a-31: de nas mchod pa dang sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D1982:160a-32: phyis mi byed par dam bca' ba dang /
T02D1982:160a-33: bsod nams kyi phyir rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D1982:160a-34: bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba dang /
T02D1982:160a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba dang /
T02D1982:160a-36: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba'i yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i smon lam bya'o //
T02D1982:160a-38: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1982:160a-39: zhes pa'i tshig bcad brjod do //
T02D1982:160a-40: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin du tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1982:160a-41: dang po byams pa bsgom par bya //
T02D1982:160a-42: gnyis pa snying rje bsgom par bya //
T02D1982:160a-43: gsum pa dga' ba bsgom pa ste //
T02D1982:160a-44: kun gyi tha mar btang snyoms so //
T02D1982:160b-0: sems can la phan pa'i @160b bsam pa ni byams pa'o //
T02D1982:160b-1: pha rol gyi gnod pa sel ba ni snying rje'o //
T02D1982:160b-2: pha rol gyi don thob pa la dga' ba ni dga' ba'o //
T02D1982:160b-3: pha rol gyi gnod pa la btang snyoms su byed pa ni btang snyoms so //
T02D1982:160b-4: de nas sngags pas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1982:160b-5: chos thams cad stong pa nyid gzung pa dang 'dzin
T02D1982:160b-6: pa rnam par spangs pa bdag nyid kyang de lta
T02D1982:160b-7: bu'i ngo bo nyid du bsgoms te /
T02D1982:160b-9: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1982:160b-10: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a wa shuddo& ham /
T02D1982:160b-11: de nas chos thams cad stong pa nyid nam mkha' lta bu las //
T02D1982:160b-12: nam mkha'i dkyil du yi ge yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsams te /
T02D1982:160b-13: gzhu lta bu kha dog sngon po /
T02D1982:160b-15: du ba'i 'od zer gyis rnam par 'khrigs pa'o //
T02D1982:160b-16: de'i steng du yi ge ram las me'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1982:160b-17: gru gsum pa kha dog dmar po 'bar ba'i phreng
T02D1982:160b-19: rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1982:160b-20: nyi ma phyed pa'i 'od lta bu'o //
T02D1982:160b-21: de'i steng du bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po
T02D1982:160b-22: khab lta bu 'od zer dkar pos kun du 'khrigs
T02D1982:160b-23: pa bum pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1982:160b-24: de'i steng du yi ge lam las sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa /
T02D1982:160b-25: kha dog ser po rdo rjes mtshan pa /
T02D1982:160b-26: 'od zer ser po kun du 'khrigs pa'o ;
T02D1982:160b-27: / de'i steng du yi ge sum las ri rab
T02D1982:160b-28: rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin ra brgyad
T02D1982:160b-30: 'od zer sna tshogs kun du 'khrigs pa'o //
T02D1982:160b-31: de'i steng du yi ge bam las sna tshogs padma /
T02D1982:160b-32: de'i steng du ram las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1982:160b-33: de'i steng du yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje /
T02D1982:160b-34: de'i 'od zer las rdo rje'i ra ba dang /
T02D1982:160b-38: phyi rol me 'bar bas bskor ba'o //
T02D1982:160b-39: aom me di n'i ba dri bha wa badzra bandha h'um /
T02D1982:160b-40: aom badzra pr'a k'a ra h'um bam h'um /
T02D1982:160b-41: aom badzra panydza ra h'um yam h'um aom badzra bi t'a na h'um kham h'um /
T02D1982:160b-42: aom badzra sa ra dz'a la tram sam tram /
T02D1982:160b-43: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um h'um h'um /
T02D1982:160b-44: de nas dpal gshin rje gshed kyi bka'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa 'od 'bar ba /
T02D1982:160b-45: de'i steng du thams cad du padma /
T02D1982:160b-47: de'i steng du 'jig rten skyong ba'i ro /
T02D1982:160b-48: dbus kyi padma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du a'a li k'a li /
T02D1982:160b-49: a'a li k'a li las zla ba dang nyi ma /
T02D1982:161a-0: @161a * // de'i dbus su yi ge bam dang h'um las rdo rje tho ba bri /
T02D1982:161a-1: de'i chang zungs la bam dang h'um gis mtshan pa /
T02D1982:161a-2: de rnams gcig tu gyur pa las gshin rje gshed po'i sku yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
T02D1982:161a-3: kha dog nag po cher khros pa //
T02D1982:161a-4: 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed pa //
T02D1982:161a-5: rdo rje ro langs ma la 'khyud pa /
T02D1982:161a-9: bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma'o /
T02D1982:161a-10: phyag g-yas kyi dang po na rdo rje tho ba /
T02D1982:161a-12: gsum pa na be con dkar po /
T02D1982:161a-13: phyag g-yon gyi dang po na padma /
T02D1982:161a-14: gnyis pa na rin po che /
T02D1982:161a-16: zhal dang po mthing ga / g-yas dmar po /
T02D1982:161a-20: steng gi zhal gnam zhal gdangs pa'o //
T02D1982:161a-22: zhabs g-yon brkyang ba'i stabs kyis rva phrag brdzis pa /
T02D1982:161a-23: ma he'i rkang pas bdud bzhi'i ro brdzis pa'o //
T02D1982:161a-24: de nas yab yum sbyor ba las phyogs skyong ba'i gshin rje brgyad pho nya'i gzugs 'dzin pa /
T02D1982:161a-25: shar phyogs su ya ba ti /
T02D1982:161a-26: lho phyogs su gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po /
T02D1982:161a-28: byang phyogs su glang mgo can /
T02D1982:161a-29: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su ral pa tshar dgu / rlung gi phyogs su smrig pa /
T02D1982:161a-30: bden bral gyi phyogs su phya sangs /
T02D1982:161a-32: gshin rje chen po brgyad po 'di rnams las ji lta ba kha dog dang /
T02D1982:161a-34: de nas bdag gi ba sbu'i bu ga nas 'od
T02D1982:161a-35: zer stod khro bo smad phur pa'i rtse mo 'dra
T02D1982:161a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyan drangs nas spyi bor bzhugs /
T02D1982:161a-38: de bzhin du spro bsdu byed cing gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D1982:161a-39: aom h'ri: sht'ri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um
T02D1982:161a-40: sarba sha t'ru n'a sha ya stam bha ya phat
T02D1982:161a-41: phat sv'a h'a / snying po'i gsang sngags so //
T02D1982:161a-42: aom h'ri ka' la r'u pa h'um kham /
T02D1982:161a-43: nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so //
T02D1982:161a-44: aom h'ri krum brum trum dzum h'um gam /
T02D1982:161a-46: aom h'ri: ha po ma h'a kro dha a'a gtstsha
T02D1982:161a-47: aa sma ta p'u dza pra ti grihna pra s'a
T02D1982:161a-48: dha me h'ri man ku ru s'va h'a /
T02D1982:161b-1: aom wi kri t'a na na tva da ma ka ka: ga: ga: dri'i'o //
T02D1982:161b-2: aom ku m'a ra r'u pi ni dza: dza: h'um ha /
T02D1982:161b-4: aom h'ri: ha ha he phat phat /
T02D1982:161b-6: aom k'a la r'u pa sarba sa tva da ma ka ma bh'u ta pa ti /
T02D1982:161b-7: aim dam ba lim grihna grihna pa ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1982:161b-9: aom d'idha lo tsa na wi kri t'a na na /
T02D1982:161b-10: ma h'a aatt'a tt'a ha sa na di ni d'i pat'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1982:161b-13: bi shva r'u pa dha ri /
T02D1982:161b-14: gtstsha gtstsha sva bh'a wa nam kri ta te /
T02D1982:161b-16: sarba bh'u ta sva pi sardza ya ma ma k'a r+yam ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1982:161b-17: slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so //
T02D1982:161b-18: gshin rje nag po bka'i 'khor lo mchod pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1982:161b-20: // / de nas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1982:161b-21: sngon gyi bka'i 'khor lo'i bdag po de yongs su gyur pa las gzhal yas khang du gyur te /
T02D1982:161b-22: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1982:161b-23: tv'a ra na bzhis brgyan pa /
T02D1982:161b-24: mdor na byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun
T02D1982:161b-25: gyi bdag nyid sgo rnams dang grva rnams su rdo
T02D1982:161b-26: rje rin po ches rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D1982:161b-27: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa /
T02D1982:161b-28: zla ba phyed pas brgyan pa /
T02D1982:161b-29: de'i dbus su padma dang nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1982:161b-30: grva rnams dang sgo rnams su yang padma dang nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1982:161b-31: dbus su padma'i gdan stengs su a'a li k'a li
T02D1982:161b-32: las yongs su gyur pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma'i
T02D1982:161b-33: steng du h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje /
T02D1982:161b-34: de rnams yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1982:161b-35: rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po kha dog nag po /
T02D1982:161b-37: 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed pa /
T02D1982:161b-38: rkang pa'i stabs kyis sa gzhi gnon par byed pa /
T02D1982:161b-39: lha dang lha min rnams la sdigs mdzub mdzad pa /
T02D1982:161b-42: phyag sum cu so bzhi pa /
T02D1982:161b-44: bskal pa'i me 'bar ba lta bu'i mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa /
T02D1982:161b-47: lha dang lha ma yin rnams gsol bar mdzad pa /
T02D1982:161b-48: dbu skra kham ba gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D1982:161b-50: g-yon brkyang pa'i stabs su gnas pa /
T02D1982:161b-51: mtshan ma 'greng ba gsus khyim che ba /
T02D1982:161b-52: zhal dang po ma he'i zhal 'jigs pa /
T02D1982:161b-54: rva g-yas pa la gnas pa'i zhal dang po mthing ga //
T02D1982:162a-0: gsum pa ser po cung zad khros @162a * //
T02D1982:162a-2: / rva g-yon pa la gnas pa'i zhal dang po dkar po /
T02D1982:162a-4: gsum pa nag po khros pa'o //
T02D1982:162a-5: rva brag la gnas pa'i zhal dmar po 'jigs par byed pa /
T02D1982:162a-8: gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1982:162a-9: zur phud lnga pa ral pa'i thor tshugs can /
T02D1982:162a-10: phyag dang po gnyis kyis glang po che'i pags pa brkyangs te 'dzin pa /
T02D1982:162a-11: phyag gzhan g-yas kyi dang po na gri gug / gnyis pa ni bhindi p'a la /
T02D1982:162a-14: lnga pa na ka na ya /
T02D1982:162a-20: bcu gcig pa na kha tv'am ga //
T02D1982:162a-22: bcu gsum pa na rdo rje /
T02D1982:162a-23: bcu bzhi pa na rdo rje'i tho ba /
T02D1982:162a-24: bco lnga pa na ral gri /
T02D1982:162a-25: bcu drug pa na rde chung ngo //
T02D1982:162a-26: g-yon dang po na thod pa /
T02D1982:162a-27: gnyis pa na tshangs pa'i mgo bo //
T02D1982:162a-29: bzhi pa na mi'i rkang pa /
T02D1982:162a-32: bdun pa na mi'i rgyu ma /
T02D1982:162a-34: dgu pa na mi'i lag pa /
T02D1982:162a-35: bcu pa na dur khrod kyi ras /
T02D1982:162a-36: bcu gcig pa na su la bi na /
T02D1982:162a-37: bcu gnyis pa na me 'bar ba /
T02D1982:162a-38: bcu gsum pa na thod tshal /
T02D1982:162a-39: bcu bzhi pa na sdigs mdzub /
T02D1982:162a-40: bco lnga pa na ba dan /
T02D1982:162a-41: bcu drug pa na rlung gi ras so //
T02D1982:162a-42: zhabs g-yas kyi dang pos mi mnan pa'o //
T02D1982:162a-43: gnyis pas ma he mnan pa'o //
T02D1982:162a-50: g-yon gyi dang pos bya rgod brdzis pa'o //
T02D1982:162a-52: gsum pas bya rog / bzhi pas seng ge /
T02D1982:162a-57: mgo bo brgya lnga bcu'i phreng bas brgyan pa /
T02D1982:162a-58: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par mdzes pa /
T02D1982:162a-59: thod pa'i phreng ba can no //
T02D1982:162a-60: grva rnams dang sgo rnams su bgegs brgyad zhabs kyis mnan pa'i lha mo brgyad de /
T02D1982:162a-68: rma bya dang 'di rnams rim pa bzhin brdzis pa'i
T02D1982:162b-0: lha mo gshin rje'i pho nya mo dang gshin @162b
T02D1982:162b-4: rdo rje'i lcags kyu ma dang /
T02D1982:162b-5: gshin rje zhags pa mo dang /
T02D1982:162b-6: gshin rje lu gu rgyud dang /
T02D1982:162b-8: 'di rnams kun kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa skra lhug par 'dug pa /
T02D1982:162b-12: las thams cad tshul bzhin du mdzad pa /
T02D1982:162b-14: phyag na thod pa dang gri bsnams pa sha stag go //
T02D1982:162b-15: lha mo 'di rnams kyang gnas so so'i gdan stengs na /
T02D1982:162b-16: bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin rang gi sa
T02D1982:162b-17: bon las skad cig ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed
T02D1982:162b-18: par bya'o // bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du dam
T02D1982:162b-19: rdzas sna tshogs pas yongs su gang ba'i thod pa
T02D1982:162b-20: par bya'o // bsam mo // dkyil 'khor gyi phyi
T02D1982:162b-21: rol du bka'i 'khor lor sngon du brjod pa'i phyogs
T02D1982:162b-22: skyong ba'i gshin rje chen po brgyad pho nya'i gzugs
T02D1982:162b-24: de'i phyi rol du dur khrod chen po brgyad la /
T02D1982:162b-25: bya sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1982:162b-33: lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D1982:162b-36: 'byung po'i tshogs rnams ha ha zhes drag tu dgod cing rnam par gtse ba /
T02D1982:162b-37: 'di lta bur rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid kyis rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi skur bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1982:162b-38: rtse gcig pa'i sems dang dad pas rnal 'byor la
T02D1982:162b-39: mnyam par bzhag na dngos grub chen po brgyad du
T02D1982:162b-40: yang 'gyur na / dngos grub phra mo lta ci smos /
T02D1982:162b-41: de nas bdag gi snying ga'i padma'i steng du /
T02D1982:162b-42: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las yi ge h'um yongs su
T02D1982:162b-43: gyur pa'i rdo rje de'i bum pa la nyi ma'i
T02D1982:162b-44: dkyil 'khor la h'um gis mtshan pa'o //
T02D1982:162b-45: h'um de las ye shes lnga'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas /
T02D1982:162b-46: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyan drangs te /
T02D1982:162b-47: sngon du brjod pa'i gsang sngags brjod do //
T02D1982:162b-48: spyan drangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams la
T02D1982:162b-49: yon chab dang bsang gtor la sogs pa'i gsang sngags
T02D1982:162b-50: kyis sngon bzhin du yon chab phul nas mnyes par
T02D1982:163a-0: byas te / dbang bskur ba'i don du de bzhin gshegs @163a * //
T02D1982:163a-1: pa de rnams kyis yi ge bcu las yongs su
T02D1982:163a-2: gyur pa'i bum pa de kho na bcu'i ngo bos
T02D1982:163a-4: de la gsol ba gdab pa ni /
T02D1982:163a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bdag la dbang bskur du gsol /
T02D1982:163a-6: de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'di skad du /
T02D1982:163a-7: sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyis //
T02D1982:163a-8: skye bas thob pa'i dbang bskur ba //
T02D1982:163a-9: ji ltar ji bzhin bdag gis ni //
T02D1982:163a-10: dag pa lha yi chus dbang bskur //
T02D1982:163a-12: dbang bskur bas de ma thag tu mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par bsam mo //
T02D1982:163a-13: lha mo brgyad la 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis dbu brgyan pa'o //
T02D1982:163a-14: phyogs skyong ba'i gshin rje brgyad la dpal gshin rje gshed kyis dbu brgyan pa'o //
T02D1982:163a-15: 'di ltar rdo rje 'jigs byed la sogs pa rnams
T02D1982:163a-16: mig la sogs pa skye mched byin gyis brlab pa
T02D1982:163a-17: sku gsung thugs kyi lha dang ye shes sems dpas
T02D1982:163a-18: mtshon pa'o // de ltar bsgom pa dang mchod pa dang /
T02D1982:163a-19: dbang bskur ba rdzogs nas bsnyen pa'i bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02D1982:163a-20: de la 'di ni rtsa ba'i snying po ste /
T02D1982:163a-21: aom ya ma r'a dza sa do me ya /
T02D1982:163a-22: ya me do ru na yo da ya /
T02D1982:163a-23: ya da yo ni ra ya kshe ya /
T02D1982:163a-24: ya kshe yatstsha ni r'a ma ya /
T02D1982:163a-25: h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1982:163a-26: yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis pa 'di ni 'bum phrag gcig sngon du bsnyen pa byas te /
T02D1982:163a-27: phyis las la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1982:163a-29: aom h'ri: sht'ri: wi kri t'a na na h'um phat /
T02D1982:163a-30: yi ge bcu pa 'di ni 'bum phrag gsum sngon
T02D1982:163a-31: du bsnyen pa byas na las thams cad byed do
T02D1982:163a-32: // aom ya m'anta ka h'um phat /
T02D1982:163a-33: yi ge bdun pa 'di ni yi ge re re
T02D1982:163a-34: la 'bum phrag re re bzlas na las thams cad
T02D1982:163a-35: byed do // aom hr'i: sht'ri: wi kri t'a na
T02D1982:163a-36: na h'um sarba sha t'rum n'a shaya stam bha ya
T02D1982:163a-38: snying po'i sngags 'di 'bum phrag bcu bzlas na las thams cad byed do //
T02D1982:163a-39: aom h'ri: k'a la r'u pa h'um kham /
T02D1982:163a-40: nye ba'i snying po 'di'i yi ge re re la
T02D1982:163a-41: 'bum phrag re re bzlas na las thams cad byed
T02D1982:163a-42: do // aom h'ri: krum brum trum dzum h'um gam /
T02D1982:163a-43: snying po dam pa 'di ni yi ge re re
T02D1982:163a-44: la 'bum phrag re re bzlas na las thams cad
T02D1982:163a-45: byed do // aom manydzu gho sha h'ri: dza: 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na las thams cad byed do //
T02D1982:163a-46: aom aa kro dhe ka ya m'anta ka ha na ma tha bhanydza h'um phat /
T02D1982:163a-47: yi ge bcu bdun pa'i snying po'o //
T02D1982:163b-0: @163b bsnyen pa'i dus su dus gsum du gtor ma dbul ba'i sngags ni /
T02D1982:163b-1: aom k'a la r'u pa sarba satva da ma ka
T02D1982:163b-2: ma h'a bhu ta pa ti ai di ba lim
T02D1982:163b-3: grihna grihna pa ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1982:163b-4: gzhan yang ci 'byor ba'i mchod pas mchod par bya'o //
T02D1982:163b-5: de nas mtshan ma thob pa dang /
T02D1982:163b-6: ji ltar 'dod pa'i las la sbyar bar bya ste /
T02D1982:163b-15: khu ba ra sa ya na dang /
T02D1982:163b-25: klu la sogs pa cho ga bzhin sngags pas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1982:163b-26: de la las kyi dus su gtor ma dang sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1982:163b-27: nyi ma dang po la rdo rje 'jigs byed 'khor dang bcas pa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1982:163b-28: nyi ma gnyis pa la gshin rje gshed bka'i 'khor lo'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1982:163b-29: nyi ma gsum pa la gshin rje chos kyi rgyal
T02D1982:163b-30: po la sogs pa pho nya'i tshogs kyi gtor ma
T02D1982:163b-31: dbul bar bya'o // de nas nyi ma bzhi pa la dur khrod kyi ras btsal te /
T02D1982:163b-32: de yang dpa' bo g-yul du mtshon gyis bsad pa'i ras kyang rung ste /
T02D1982:163b-33: de la mi'i khrag gis byugs te /
T02D1982:163b-34: de nas gro la sogs pa'i phyes legs par byugs /
T02D1982:163b-35: de nas ro'i skud pas 'khor lo'i thig gdab ste /
T02D1982:163b-36: thig bzhi btab pas re'u mig dgu pa'i thig skor gsum gyis bskor ba /
T02D1982:163b-37: dbus su re'u mig dgu pa /
T02D1982:163b-38: gnyis pa re'u mig bcu gnyis pa /
T02D1982:163b-39: gsum pa re'u mig bcu drug pa'o //
T02D1982:163b-40: de la snag tsha'i rgyu ni ba to li'i 'bras bu dang /
T02D1982:163b-43: ro bsregs pa'i sol ba rnams bsres te /
T02D1982:163b-45: de rnams ma rnyed na bsam par bya'o //
T02D1982:163b-46: de la bri ba'i phyag rgya ni /
T02D1982:163b-47: lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar te //
T02D1982:163b-48: gung mo gnyis rtsi sprad de /
T02D1982:163b-49: srin lag gnyis tshigs bcag / mthe'u chung de bzhin du sbyar te /
T02D1982:163b-50: mdzub mo gnyis bkug / mthe bo gnyis mnyam par
T02D1982:163b-51: sbyar ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste des
T02D1982:163b-52: bri bar bya'o // de'i dam tshig gi snying po'o //
T02D1982:163b-53: aom h'ri: sht'ri: wi kri t'a na na ma ma
T02D1982:163b-54: sha t'rum m'a ra ya n'a sha ya stam bha
T02D1982:163b-55: ya bandha ya h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D1982:164a-0: @164a * // gshin rje gshed po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags de bzlas shing bri bar bya'o //
T02D1982:164a-1: de bri ba'i smyu gu'i rgyu ni bya rog dang /
T02D1982:164a-3: gong ma'i rdzas ma rnyed na mi khrag dang /
T02D1982:164a-5: khyi'i khrag gsum gyis bri bar bya'o //
T02D1982:164a-6: ya dang ya'i bar du ming dang rus bri bar bya'o //
T02D1982:164a-7: phyi rol du sgra'i yi ge bcu drug bri bar bya'o //
T02D1982:164a-8: rim pa gnyis pa la h'um dang phat kyis ming rus spel te bri bar bya'o //
T02D1982:164a-9: ya dang ya'i bar du bri ba dbus kyi lte ba la'o //
T02D1982:164a-10: gdug pa'i yi ge thams cad kyang bri bar bya'o //
T02D1982:164a-11: ji ltar gong ma'i gnas der h'um dang phat bri bar bya'o //
T02D1982:164a-12: 'khor lo de nyid du chud pa'i gshin rje gshed po yang bri bar bya'o //
T02D1982:164a-13: gzhan yang 'khor lo gnyis ba skor phyogs ma yin par bya ste /
T02D1982:164a-15: kham phor kha sbyar du bcug la skud pa nag pos dkri bar bya'o //
T02D1982:164a-16: de nas byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D1982:164a-17: mig gi phyag rgya bcas la h'um ya m'anta kri
T02D1982:164a-18: ta badzra dharm'a tsakshu pra be sha ya na zhes
T02D1982:164a-19: brjod do // zhal gyi phyag rgya bcas la /
T02D1982:164a-20: aom ya m'anta ka de ba sho da ya tram pra be sha ya phat /
T02D1982:164a-21: gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya bcas la /
T02D1982:164a-22: aom ya m'anta ka badzra h'ri: mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D1982:164a-23: aom badzra gu h+ya gu ha lam /
T02D1982:164a-24: de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la /
T02D1982:164a-25: bsgom pa dang ldan pas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D1982:164a-26: nyi ma dang po la ya ma r'a dza sa
T02D1982:164a-27: do me ya che ge mo bhra ma nam ku
T02D1982:164a-28: ru h'um phat / nyi ma gnyis pa la ya
T02D1982:164a-29: me do ru na yo da che ge mo raktam
T02D1982:164a-30: tsha dha ba na ya h'um phat /
T02D1982:164a-31: nyi ma gsum pa la ya da yo ni ra
T02D1982:164a-32: yakshe ya che ge mo mu rtsa p'a ya h'um
T02D1982:164a-33: phat / nyi ma bzhi pa la yakshe yatstsha ni
T02D1982:164a-34: r'a ma ya che ge mo m'a ra ya h'um
T02D1982:164a-35: phat / phat / de nas nyi ma bzhis ma grub na /
T02D1982:164a-36: mchod pa dang gtor ma dang sbyin sreg byas la
T02D1982:164a-37: gsang sngags khri phrag bzhi bzlas nas sngon gyi las
T02D1982:164a-39: de nas kham phor de dur khrod kyi mes nim pa'i shing la sbar te bsro bar bya'o //
T02D1982:164a-40: de nas kham phor kha sbyar dur khrod du sba bar bya'o //
T02D1982:164a-43: gshin rje mtshan mo nag mo dang /
T02D1982:164a-44: dus mtshan rnams khyad par du gsod pa'i las byed pas de rnams la lhag par gtad do //
T02D1982:164a-47: gshin rje pho nya mo dang /
T02D1982:164b-0: gshin rje @164b mche ba mo rnams ni bsgrub bya myos pa'i las byed pa la shis so //
T02D1982:164b-3: gshin rje lcags kyu ma dang /
T02D1982:164b-4: gshin rje zhags pa ma rnams ni bsgrub bya khrag skyug tu gzhug pa'i las la shis so //
T02D1982:164b-7: gshin rje lu gu rgyud ma dang /
T02D1982:164b-8: gshin rje 'bebs ma rnams ni bsgrub bya 'khor du gzhug pa'i las la shis so //
T02D1982:164b-9: rnal 'byor pas 'di rnams kyi sbyor bas gtor ma dang /
T02D1982:164b-12: las kyi gnye gtad pa thams cad bya'o //
T02D1982:164b-13: 'di ni drag po'i las kyi cho ga'o /
T02D1982:164b-16: // / de nas mdza' sde dbye bar 'dod pas bya rog
T02D1982:164b-17: dang 'ug pa'i sgro la bram ze'i skra dang mu
T02D1982:164b-18: stegs kyi skras dkris te da du ra'i shing la
T02D1982:164b-19: bsreg par bya'o // de nas thal ba de blang nas bsgrub bya'i nyal sar sbas te /
T02D1982:164b-20: dus mtshan ma la las bcol na 'bye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1982:164b-23: // / de nas bsgrub bya de dag 'thab par 'dod na /
T02D1982:164b-24: dug dang khrag la sogs pa'i rdzas kyis bsgrub bya'i
T02D1982:164b-25: ming dang spel ba'i sngags dur khrod kyi ras la
T02D1982:164b-26: bris te / ne'i le'i spu dang sprul gyi pags pa rnams kyis dril te /
T02D1982:164b-27: mar me byas na gang gi mthong ba de dag 'thab par 'gyur ro //
T02D1982:164b-31: bshang gci las dgra'i gzugs brnyan byas te /
T02D1982:164b-33: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sbyor bas nam phyed na gcer bur byung ste /
T02D1982:164b-34: skra bshig nas dur khrod kyi ro bsregs pa'i me la kha lho phyogs su bltas te /
T02D1982:164b-35: bsgrub bya'i ming dang gsang sngags spel te gzugs brnyan
T02D1982:164b-36: de dum bur bcad cing bsregs na myur du 'chi'o
T02D1982:164b-37: // 'di'i sbyor ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1982:164b-38: de nas rnal 'byor pas mnan par 'dod pas /
T02D1982:164b-39: gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor lo rdo'am ras la yung
T02D1982:164b-40: ba'am ldong ros kyis gsang sngags dang ming spel te
T02D1982:164b-41: bris pas de gnon par 'gyur ro //
T02D1982:164b-43: dur khrod kyi ras la dug la sogs pa'i rdzas
T02D1982:164b-44: kyis gshin rje'i 'khor lo ming dang sngags spel te
T02D1982:164b-45: bris la / bdag nyid til chen pos lus byugs te /
T02D1982:165a-0: dri chen pos gdug pa'i gzugs @165a * //
T02D1982:165a-2: de'i snying gar 'khor lo bcug nas /
T02D1982:165a-3: dur khrod du ro bsregs pa'i shing gi mi la
T02D1982:165a-4: dum bur gtub cing bsregs na 'chi bar 'gyur ro
T02D1982:165a-5: // lha'i sbyor ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1982:165a-7: da du ra'i 'bras bu dang sha chen dang srin
T02D1982:165a-8: gyis zos pa'i phye ma rnams la lha'i sbyor bas
T02D1982:165a-10: bza' ba dang btung ba'i nang du blugs te /
T02D1982:165a-11: dgra la blud na skad cig gis smyo bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1982:165a-13: de nas dbang du bya bar 'dod na /
T02D1982:165a-14: srin bu ba la mig gi brus pa'i sa dang /
T02D1982:165a-16: go ro tsa na rnams bsres te /
T02D1982:165a-17: gzugs brnyan sor bcu drug pa byas te /
T02D1982:165a-18: de nas go ro tsa na dang /
T02D1982:165a-19: srin lag gi khrag gis gro ga'i shun pa la 'khor lo bris te /
T02D1982:165a-20: gzugs brnyan gyi snying gar cug nas me tog dmar
T02D1982:165a-21: pos dus su mchod cing rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi
T02D1982:165a-22: sbyor bas nub tu kha bltas te /
T02D1982:165a-23: yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzlas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D1982:165a-24: 'dis brgya byin yang dbang du 'dus na /
T02D1982:165a-25: gang skye 'gro phra mo lta ci smos /
T02D1982:165a-27: thod pa gnyis kha sbyar te /
T02D1982:165a-29: khadhi ra'i shing la me sbar te bsro'o //
T02D1982:165a-30: bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel te g-yang sngags bzlas na rlung gi shugs kyis 'gugs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1982:165a-31: de nas bskrad par 'dod na khyi dang /
T02D1982:165a-33: rus sbal rnams kyi sha dang /
T02D1982:165a-34: byi ba'i khrag dang rnga mo'i spangs rnams kyis nim pa'i shing la me sbar te /
T02D1982:165a-35: rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sbyin sreg byas te /
T02D1982:165a-36: bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel ba'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas na skrod par 'gyur ro //
T02D1982:165a-37: de nas bu mo mnan par 'dod na /
T02D1982:165a-39: ske tshe rnams rang gi khrag gis sprus te stong
T02D1982:165a-40: du sbyin sreg byas na bu mo gnon par 'gyur
T02D1982:165a-41: ro // yi ge bcu pa'i gsang sngags kyi bzlas pa brjod byas na the tshom med do //
T02D1982:165a-42: de nas zhi bar bya bar 'dod na mar dang /
T02D1982:165a-45: rtsva ku sha rnams shing pa la sha'i me la
T02D1982:165a-46: kha shar phyogs su blas te bzlas brjod brgya rtsa
T02D1982:165a-47: brgyad byas na g-yul thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro
T02D1982:165a-48: // de nas rgyas par bya bar 'dod na /
T02D1982:165b-1: mar rnams kyis shing audumw'a ra'i me la kha dog
T02D1982:165b-2: ser po'i lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas kha byang
T02D1982:165b-4: dus gsum du lan stong du sbyin sreg byas na rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1982:165b-5: las 'di rnams ni rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis bya'o //
T02D1982:165b-6: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems kyis byas na 'grub par mi 'gyur zhing ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1982:165b-7: de bas na rnal 'byor 'ga' zhig gis dur khrod la sogs par stong ste /
T02D1982:165b-8: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sbyor bas dus kun du bya'o //
T02D1982:165b-9: las gang byed pa'i dus su bsgrub bya'i ming dang bskul ba dang bcas te bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1982:165b-11: yi ge gsum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs te /
T02D1982:165b-12: thams cad la so sor ji lta ba bzhin du sngags bzlas so //
T02D1982:165b-13: de la bsad pa'i dus su bdag nyid rdo rje
T02D1982:165b-14: 'jigs byed kyi sbyor bas 'od zer sngon du brjod
T02D1982:165b-15: pa pho nya'i tshogs lta bu spros te /
T02D1982:165b-16: de rnams kyis bsgrub bya'i tshe dang rnam par shes pa rnams bkug ste /
T02D1982:165b-17: 'khor lo'i dbus su bstims nas gsang sngags kyi 'od zer gyis /
T02D1982:165b-20: sha khrag dang bral bar bya ste /
T02D1982:165b-21: keng rus 'ba' zhig gnas par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1982:165b-23: mnan pa la sogs pa la yang /
T02D1982:165b-24: de lta bu'i sbyor bas bya'o //
T02D1982:165b-26: dbang la sogs pa la ni bdag nyid kha dog dmar po'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1982:165b-27: zhi ba la ni kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1982:165b-28: las thams cad la yang lha'i sbyor ba ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sbyor bas bya'o //
T02D1982:165b-29: de nas gzhan yang nang gi sbyor bcud zad brjod par bya'o //
T02D1982:165b-30: de la lus kyi smad ni don yod grub pa'i bdag nyid du blta bar bya'o //
T02D1982:165b-31: de'i steng du gru gsum gyi gnas ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi bdag nyid du blta'o //
T02D1982:165b-32: de'i steng du lta ba ni mi bskyod pa'i bdag nyid du blta'o //
T02D1982:165b-33: de'i steng du brang ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi bdag nyid du blta'o ;
T02D1982:165b-34: / smin mtshams ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi bdag nyid du blta bar bya'o //
T02D1982:165b-35: de'i steng du padma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis /
T02D1982:165b-36: de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1982:165b-37: de'i steng du mi 'chi ba kha sbub pa las rtag tu bdud rtsi 'dzag par blta'o //
T02D1982:166a-2: de'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor //
T02D1982:166a-3: de'i dkyil du dang po'i yi ge blta bar bya ste /
T02D1982:166a-4: rtag tu ye shes kyi me gyen du 'bar ba'o //
T02D1982:166a-5: de'i steng du snying gar padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02D1982:166a-6: de'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la sa bon
T02D1982:166a-7: dgus yongs su gang ba'i dbus kyi h'um gi dkyil
T02D1982:166a-9: de'i dkyil du yi ge mum yongs su gyur pa'i
T02D1982:166a-10: 'jam pa'i rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1982:166a-11: kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
T02D1982:166a-12: de'i steng du mgul bar padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa /
T02D1982:166a-13: de'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1982:166a-14: de'i steng du padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02D1982:166a-15: de'i dbus su yi ge aa dmar po /
T02D1982:166a-16: de'i 'dab ma la gzugs kyi rdo rje la ma sogs pa'i lha mo brgyad kyi sa bon /
T02D1982:166a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i
T02D1982:166a-18: ye shes kyi longs spyod nyams su myong ba'i bdag
T02D1982:166a-19: nyid bsam mo // 'di lta bur rdo rje 'jigs
T02D1982:166a-20: byed du bsgoms pa'i spyi gtsug tu mi bskyod pa
T02D1982:166a-21: nyid bsam mo // / snying gar ye shes sems
T02D1982:166a-22: dpa' dang sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang ldan
T02D1982:166a-24: ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1982:166a-25: skad cig kyang sna tshogs pa'i sems mi bskyed de /
T02D1982:166a-26: 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan du yang 'di las gzhan pa'i thabs med do //
T02D1982:166a-27: de bas na dngos grub kyi phyir dang /
T02D1982:166a-28: bsad pa'i phyir dang zla ba drug tu 'di'i bsam gtan bya'o //
T02D1982:166a-29: bsam pa thams cad yongs su spangs te zla ba phyed du brtag par bya'o //
T02D1982:166a-30: 'di yi dge bas kun mthong ste //
T02D1982:166a-31: bdag kyang gnod pa las rgyal nas //
T02D1982:166a-32: nad dang gnod pa 'chi ba dang //
T02D1982:166a-33: rga ba'i rlabs chen 'khrugs pa las //
T02D1982:166a-34: 'gro ba'i rgya mtsho sgrol bar shog / dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs /
T02D1982:166a-35: a'a ts'a rya don yod rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs /
T02D1982:166a-38: rgya gar gyi mkhan po manydzu shr'i dzny'a na dang /
T02D1982:166a-39: bod kyi lo ts'a ba rong zom chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing /
